sub_title: Career Counselor/ Exam Officer at International School of The Hague
summary: Over 13 years of experience in international organisations including the last 7 years with International School of the Hague where I have initiated , led and delivered many tasks . I am a compassionate learner and drive my task with practical experience and attention to details.

school.name: Lourdes Convent High School , Surat , Gujarat , India

profile_positions.description:
Reporting  directly to the Deputy Heads Academic (MYP, DP, CP) and support teaching colleagues and students.
● responsible for preparing, organising, running and supervising all internal examinations (the Y10 and 11 test weeks, the Y12 December and June exams, and the Y13 mock exams) in accordance with the school and IB regulations;
● assist in preparing, organising, supervising and running the external examinations (May and November IBDP examinations) in accordance with the IB regulations, and
provide administrative support on all aspects relating to these examinations.
The examinations include written and oral examinations.
Draw up internal examination timetables in conjunction with the timetabler, SALs and SCs; in consultation with the Deputy Heads Academic, draw up the school’s external examination schedule based on the generic schedule provided by the IBO, to include dates, times, venues, number of candidates and invigilators
Resolve examination clashes for internal examinations and make appropriate arrangements for the students affected; assist the Deputy Head Academic IBDP in resolving examination clashes for external examinations and making appropriate arrangements for the students affected
For examinations held during term time: arrange invigilation, in conjunction with the timetabler, including briefing and training invigilators in school and IB procedures; for examinations held during holidays: in consultation with the Deputy Head Academic IBDP, recruit, train and deploy a team of invigilators, compiling an invigilation rota, ensuring the correct ratio of invigilators required, and maintaining accurate records
Organise the examination rooms.
In conjunction with the Deputy Heads Academic organise inclusive assessment arrangements (IAA) provisions.
profile_positions.title: Exam Officer

profile_positions.description:
Administrative Assistant 
	•	Handling correspondence (letters, emails) and telephone enquiries from parents and students.
	•	Using and maintaining some modules of the SOM database for school.
	•      Gathering statistical information for the management
	•	Keeping the database upto date with contact details for parents , students and school staff.
	•	Maintaining the filing system and records for all students.
	•	Keeping the records of withdrawals updated.
	•	Preparing Transcripts & U-Confirms for the IB students and withdrawal students.
	•	Assisting Staff with all required help in daily school routine.
	•	Arranging the Parent Teacher conference via School Booking software.
	•	Assisting the Event Manager , Reception & other staff with Administrative jobs.

Admission Assistant ( feb 2015 - June 2015)
	•	Handling correspondence (letters, emails) and telephone enquiries
	•	Using and maintaining some modules of the SOM database (administrative software)
	•	Assisting the Head of Admissions in setting up appointments for prospective candidates
	•	Gathering statistical information for the management
	•	Maintaining the filing system
	•	Prepare brochures, mailings, and other publications used in the correspondence of prospective students.
profile_positions.title: Administrative Assistant

profile_positions.description:
Administration included :
Managing contracts & services for outsource Companies (Lease , Security, Housekeeping , Card Access System & Camera , Servers & IT departments)
Managing Administration & operational requirement for companies all 8 branches across India.
Material management for Administration & marketing division. Releasing PO & managing all vendors.
Supporting HR Including with formal welcome for new joinee & all leaving formalities.
Managing track for attendance for company employee as well as contract employees.
Managing facility & infrastructure management 


Purchase included : (since May 2012)
Purchase  & material management of all lab requirements
Price negotiations , releasing PO , evaluating suppliers , supplier visits etc
Cost cutting by constant market study of new suppliers & better lab equipments.
Records of company assists .
Planning & budgeting for new assets .
Vendor management . Listing new vendors in the system , etc

Other Responsibilities: Month end reports with finance for both departments . preparing SOP of both department . Constantly assuring practice of SHE policy . Setting SOPs for departments & also successfully handled Audits like ISO, GMP & AABB for the company. Co-ordination for all 8 branches across different cities in India. Travel Management Services for visitors and employees. Transport Management, Stationery, logistics (Mail/Courier) Management & toll free number for the company .Have taken lot of initiative to stop wastage & optimal use of resources for cost cutting measures within the organization. Had Initiated Friday Fun Activity sessions for employees.
profile_positions.title: Senior executive - Contracts  & Procurement , administration

profile_positions.description:
All Admin facility management & customer service for branch.
Relation Building & maintain contact details.
Database management both for clients & office.
Preparing daily activity reports and MIS. 
Back Office operations. 
Interacting with potential customers and addressing telephonic queries & email. Maintaining the database of generated leads.
Resolving & handling walk-in Clients to the branch
Coordinating with all the teams to develop more business for the company.
Responding to all Customer Queries (telephonic as well as email) and Co-ordination with concerned Person.
Travel &  arrange helpdesk for maximum target achievement in nearby locations.
Telephone based support & selling.
Handling Client Billing System and client servicing.
Responsible for all admin work including daily cash handling deposit and others
profile_positions.title: Sr. Executive
